Data.Mappers

Class IRequestMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data.Mappers.IRequestMapper

  • public abstract class IRequestMapper
extends Object
    Interface for RequestMapper. Is public so that its javadoc can be published.
    Author:
    Obaydah Mohamad

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void deleteRequest(int id)
      Deletes a specific request from db-table 'request'.
      protected abstract int getDimensionPrice(int roof_id, int length)
      Used in flatRoof calculator to find price of rooftype with specified dimensions.
      protected abstract Request getRequest(int id)
      Returns a specific request object with all its sub-tables - used when a seller wants to process a request.
      protected abstract List<Request> getRequests()
      Returns a list of all requests in dB; used to display all requests not yet processed in jsp-file 'showrequests'.
      protected abstract ShippingAddress getRequestShippingAddress(int id)
      Returns a ShippingAddress object which contains user and user shipping info, specified by request id.
      protected abstract Roof getRoof(int id)
      Fetches data from rooftype-table in dB and returns a roof object with id, name and inclined attributes - used in genereate request command, when a request object is created.
      protected abstract Roof getRoof(int id, int length)
      Fetches data from rooftype-table and its child-table, rooflength, where the length and price of the can be found - used to return a LineItem in calculateBOM.
      protected abstract List<Roof> getRoofs()
      Returns roofs of all types - used in DataInsertion class which loops through list, checks if roof is type inclined or flat, and inserts data dependent on which type it is.
      protected abstract List<Roof> getRoofs(int rooftype)
      Returns all roofs with specified rooftype (inclined or flat).
      protected abstract void insertDimensions(int id, int length, int price, int stock)
      Is used in data insertion class, where different dimensions of a roof is inserted.
      protected abstract void insertRequest(Request req)
      Inserts a request to db-table 'request' (and all its child tables) with specified user-input fetched from jsp-files 'flatroof- and incline'.

      • instance

        protected static IRequestMapper instance()

      • setDataSource

        protected abstract void setDataSource(DataSource ds)

      • getRequest

        protected abstract Request getRequest(int id)
                               throws SystemErrorException,
                                      NoSuchRequestException,
                                      NoSuchShedException
        Returns a specific request object with all its sub-tables - used when a seller wants to process a request.
        Parameters:
        id - of the request
        Returns:
        Throws:
        SystemErrorException - if an sql-exception is thrown
        NoSuchRequestException - if no request with specified id can be found
        NoSuchShedException - if no shed with specified id can be found

      • getRequests

        protected abstract List<Request> getRequests()
                                      throws SystemErrorException,
                                             NoSuchShedException
        Returns a list of all requests in dB; used to display all requests not yet processed in jsp-file 'showrequests'.
        Returns:
        list of all requests in dB
        Throws:
        SystemErrorException - if an sql-exception is thrown
        NoSuchShedException - if a shed with specified id cannot be found

      • insertRequest

        protected abstract void insertRequest(Request req)
                               throws SystemErrorException
        Inserts a request to db-table 'request' (and all its child tables) with specified user-input fetched from jsp-files 'flatroof- and incline'.
        Parameters:
        req - the request
        Throws:
        SystemErrorException - if an sql exception is thrown

      • deleteRequest

        protected abstract void deleteRequest(int id)
                               throws SystemErrorException,
                                      NoSuchRequestException,
                                      NoSuchCarportException,
                                      NoSuchShedException
        Deletes a specific request from db-table 'request'. Calls deleteRequestCarport and deleteRequestShed, so that the carport and the shed for the given shed also gets deleted. Used when a seller wants to delete a request.
        Parameters:
        id - the request id
        Throws:
        NoSuchRequestException - if an sql exception is thrown
        SystemErrorException
        NoSuchCarportException
        NoSuchShedException

      • insertDimensions

        protected abstract void insertDimensions(int id,
                                         int length,
                                         int price,
                                         int stock)
                                  throws SystemErrorException
        Is used in data insertion class, where different dimensions of a roof is inserted.
        Parameters:
        id - of the roof
        length - of the roof
        price - of the roof
        stock - of the roof
        Throws:
        SystemErrorException - if an sql exception is thrown

      • getDimensionPrice

        protected abstract int getDimensionPrice(int roof_id,
                                         int length)
                                  throws SystemErrorException
        Used in flatRoof calculator to find price of rooftype with specified dimensions.
        Parameters:
        roof_id - id of the roof
        length - of the roof to be fetched
        Returns:
        the desired roof with length and id as specified
        Throws:
        SystemErrorException - if no roof with specified id & length can be found

      • getRoof

        protected abstract Roof getRoof(int id)
                         throws NoSuchRoofException,
                                SystemErrorException
        Fetches data from rooftype-table in dB and returns a roof object with id, name and inclined attributes - used in genereate request command, when a request object is created.
        Parameters:
        id - of the roof
        Returns:
        Throws:
        NoSuchRoofException
        SystemErrorException

      • getRoof

        protected abstract Roof getRoof(int id,
                                int length)
                         throws SystemErrorException
        Fetches data from rooftype-table and its child-table, rooflength, where the length and price of the can be found - used to return a LineItem in calculateBOM.
        Parameters:
        id - of the roof
        length - of the roof
        Returns:
        desired roof with specified id and length
        Throws:
        SystemErrorException - if an sql-exception is thrown

      • getRoofs

        protected abstract List<Roof> getRoofs()
                                throws SystemErrorException
        Returns roofs of all types - used in DataInsertion class which loops through list, checks if roof is type inclined or flat, and inserts data dependent on which type it is. Returns all roofs
        Returns:
        all roofs, independent on rooftype.
        Throws:
        SystemErrorException - if an sql exception is thrown

      • getRoofs

        protected abstract List<Roof> getRoofs(int rooftype)
                                throws SystemErrorException
        Returns all roofs with specified rooftype (inclined or flat).
        Parameters:
        rooftype -
        Returns:
        all roofs with specified rooftype
        Throws:
        NoSuchRoofException
        SystemErrorException

      • getRequestShippingAddress

        protected abstract ShippingAddress getRequestShippingAddress(int id)
                                                      throws SystemErrorException
        Returns a ShippingAddress object which contains user and user shipping info, specified by request id.
        Parameters:
        id - of request with the shipping address
        Returns:
        user-info(firstname, lastname, address, zipcode and city)
        Throws:
        SystemErrorException - if an sql-exception is thrown
